text: Proper Worship
Thus says Yahweh:
“Heaven \add is\add* my throne,
and the earth \add is\add* the footstool for my feet.
Where \add is\add* this house that you would build for me?
And where \add is\add* this resting place for me?
And my hand has made all these \add things\add*,
and all these ⸤came to be⸥,”\f + \fr 66:2 \ft Literally “were” \f*
⸤declares⸥\f + \fr 66:2 \ft Literally “declaration of” \f* Yahweh, “but\f + \fr 66:2 \ft Or “and” \f* I look to this \add one\add*:
to \add the\add* humble and \add the\add* contrite of spirit
and \add the one\add* frightened at my word.
The one who slaughters \add a\add* bull strikes a man;
the one who slaughters \add a\add* lamb for sacrifice breaks the neck \add of\add* a dog.
The one who offers an offering, \add the\add* blood of swine;
the one who offers frankincense blesses an idol.
Indeed, they themselves have chosen their ways,
and their soul delights in their abhorrence.
Indeed, I myself I will choose their ill treatment,
and I will bring them objects of their dread,
because I called, and ⸤no one answered⸥;\f + \fr 66:4 \ft Literally “there was no one who answers” \f*
I spoke and they did not listen,
but\f + \fr 66:4 \ft Or “and” \f* they did the evil in my eyes,
and they chose that in which I do not delight.”
Hear the word of Yahweh, you who are frightened at his word:
Your brothers who hate you,
who exclude you for my name’s sake have said,
“Let Yahweh be honored so that\f + \fr 66:5 \ft Or “and” \f* we may see your joy!”
But\f + \fr 66:5 \ft Or “And” \f* they themselves shall be ashamed.
A voice, an uproar from \add the\add* city!
A voice from \add the\add* temple!
The voice of Yahweh ⸤paying back⸥\f + \fr 66:6 \ft Literally “rewarding retribution to” \f* his enemies!
Zion’s Delivery
Before she was in labor she gave birth;
before labor pains\f + \fr 66:7 \ft Hebrew “pain” \f* came to her, she gave birth to a son.
Who has heard \add anything\add* like this?
Who has seen \add anything\add* like these \add things\add*?
Can a land be born in one day?
Or can a nation be born in a moment?
\add Yet\add* when she was in labor, Zion indeed gave birth \add to\add* her children.
Shall I myself I break open and not ⸤deliver⸥?”\f + \fr 66:9 \ft Literally “cause to bring forth” \f* says Yahweh,
“or I who ⸤delivers⸥\f + \fr 66:9 \ft Literally “causes to bring forth” \f* lock up \add the womb\add*?” says your God.
“Rejoice with Jerusalem
and shout in exultation with her, all those who love her!
Rejoice with her \add in\add* joy, all those who mourn over her,
so that you may suck and be satisfied from her ⸤consoling breast⸥,\f + \fr 66:11 \ft Literally “breast of consolation” \f*
so that you may drink deeply and refresh yourselves from her ⸤heavy breast⸥.”\f + \fr 66:11 \ft Literally “breast of heaviness “ \f*
For thus says Yahweh:
“Look! I \add am\add* about to spread prosperity out to her like a river,
and \add the\add* wealth of \add the\add* nations like an overflowing stream,
and you shall suck and be carried on the hip;
and you shall you shall be played with on the knees.
As a man whose mother comforts him, so I myself will comfort you,
and you shall be comforted in Jerusalem.
Yahweh’s Final Judgment
And you shall see and your heart shall rejoice,
and your bones shall ⸤flourish⸥\f + \fr 66:14 \ft Literally “sprout” \f* like the grass,
and the hand of Yahweh shall make itself known ⸤to⸥\f + \fr 66:14 \ft Literally “with” \f* his servants,
and he shall curse his enemies.
For look! Yahweh will come in fire,
and his chariots like the storm wind,
to ⸤give back⸥\f + \fr 66:15 \ft Literally “cause to turn around” \f* his anger in wrath,
and his rebuke in flames of fire.
For Yahweh enters into judgment \add on\add* all flesh with fire and his sword,
and ⸤those slain by⸥\f + \fr 66:16 \ft Literally “the slain of” \f* Yahweh shall be many.
Those who sanctify themselves
and those who cleanse themselves ⸤to go into⸥\f + \fr 66:17 \ft Literally “toward” \f* the gardens after \add the\add* one in the middle,
eating the flesh of swine
and detestable things\f + \fr 66:17 \ft Hebrew “thing” \f* and rodents\f + \fr 66:17 \ft Hebrew “rodent” \f* together
shall come to an end!” ⸤declares⸥\f + \fr 66:17 \ft Literally “declaration of” \f* Yahweh.
“And I—their works and thoughts!—\add am\add* about to come to gather all nations and tongues,
and they shall come and see my glory.
And I will set a sign among them,
and I will send survivors from them to the nations:
Tarshish, Pul, and Lud, who draw \add the\add* bow;
Tubal and Javan, the faraway coastlands
that have not heard \add of\add* my fame,
and have not seen my glory.
And they shall declare my glory among the nations,

and bring all your countrymen\f + \fr 66:20 \ft Or “brothers” \f* from all the nations \add as\add* an offering to Yahweh on horses and chariots\f + \fr 66:20 \ft Hebrew “chariot” \f* and in litters and on mules and camels, to\f + \fr 66:20 \ft Or “on” \f* ⸤my holy mountain⸥,\f + \fr 66:20 \ft Literally “the mountain of holiness me” \f* Jerusalem,” says Yahweh, “just as the sons of Israel bring \add an\add* offering in a clean vessel \add to\add* the house of Yahweh.
And indeed, I will take some of them as priests \add and\add* the Levites,” says Yahweh.

“For just as the new heavens and earth that I \add am\add* about to make shall stand before me,” ⸤declares⸥\f + \fr 66:22 \ft Literally “declaration of” \f* Yahweh, “so shall your descendants\f + \fr 66:22 \ft Hebrew “descendant” \f* and your name stand.

And this shall happen: From ⸤new moon to new moon⸥\f + \fr 66:23 \ft Literally “enough of new moon in his new moon” \f* and from ⸤Sabbath to Sabbath⸥\f + \fr 66:23 \ft Literally “enough of Sabbath in his Sabbath” \f* all flesh shall come to bow in worship before me,” says Yahweh.
“And they shall go out and look at the corpses of the people\f + \fr 66:24 \ft Or “men” \f* ⸤who have rebelled⸥\f + \fr 66:24 \ft Literally “rebelling” \f* against me,
for their worm shall not die,
and their fire shall not be quenched,
and they shall be an abhorrence to all flesh.”
